europeana:record.dc:title: Eucricetodon and Melissiodon (Cricetidae, Rodentia) from the Ramblian and lower Aragonian of the Calamocha area (Calatayud-Teruel Basin, Spain)
Scripta Geologica
europeana:record.dc:creator: Sesé C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Paleozoölogie
europeana:record.dc:description: This paper is one in a series of monographs on the mammal faunas from the type area of the Aragonian and adjacent areas (Calamocha area) in the provinces of Teruel and Zaragoza. It deals with the description and palaeoenvironmental interpretation of Eucricetodon and Melissiodon (Cricetidae; hamsters).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Eucricetodon and Melissiodon (Cricetidae, Rodentia) from the Ramblian and lower Aragonian of the Calamocha area (Calatayud-Teruel Basin, Spain) (URN:ISSN:0375-7587) (Volume 83)
